definition: to catch the wind/to go for a spin in the fresh air
pocket/bag/to wrap up or hold in a bag/to move in a circle/to canvas or solicit/to take responsibility for/to disclose in detail/combat armor (old)

sentences.english: Do you love drunk driving but hate spending the night in the slammer?
sentences.chinese: 你是否喜欢酒后驾车兜风但是恼恨在班房里过夜？

sentences.english: And cruising down a country road, with the top down.
sentences.chinese: 在乡村公路上兜风，打开车的顶蓬。

sentences.english: On my next day off, I don't want to gor for a drive.
sentences.chinese: 在我的下个休息日，我不想开车去兜风。

sentences.english: Tape magnets to the bottom of a cup, put it on the roof of your car and drive around.
sentences.chinese: 在杯底粘上一块磁铁，放到车顶上，开着车四处兜风。

sentences.english: And maybe I can borrow it some time and try it out.
sentences.chinese: 也许什么时候我能向你借来兜兜风。

sentences.english: Sure.the weather is perfect for a ride.
sentences.chinese: 当然好啊!天气正适合兜风。

sentences.english: I'm free this afternoon. Could you please take me for a ride in your car?
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我有空。你能用你的车带我去兜一兜风吗？

sentences.english: You can head for a long romantic drive to celebrate this Valentine's Day. In fact this is one of the best romantic valentine ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你可以计划一个浪漫的兜风行程来庆祝情人节。

sentences.english: He takes her out for little rides in the car.
sentences.chinese: 他常带她出去开车兜风。

sentences.english: I can not forget is that the sedan chair sitting in the drive when Luoyang.
sentences.chinese: 我忘不了的，是坐着花轿在洛阳兜风的时候。

sentences.english: One day my father took us for a family drive in the country.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我爸爸带我们一家到乡下兜风。

sentences.english: The weather is so nice that I want to go for a drive.
sentences.chinese: 天气很棒，我想开车出去兜兜风。

sentences.english: Shall we go for a ridden a car?
We did a lot of cycling on the outskirts of our city last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月我们常在市郊骑自行车兜风。

sentences.english: Or maybe a bike ride around the block tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 亦或是明天骑脚踏车在住家附近兜兜风？

sentences.english: You can knit a sweater by the fireside. Sunday mornings go for a ride.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在炉边织毛衣，周日早上就兜风去。

definition: variant of 軋馬路|轧马路[ya4 ma3 lu4]
(dialect) to take a walk/to go for a stroll
to stroll around the streets (esp. of a young couple)
to stroll/to go for a walk
to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
to take a dog for a walk
to drive away cares/to relieve boredom
